attributes.title: Womans wool sweater
attributes.description:
Created on March 2, 2010 by jenniferksharpe on Sourcemap.org:

Wool comes from Australia, and is shipped to China for production.

attributes.name: Womans wool sweater
attributes.title: Womans wool sweater
attributes.description: Wool comes from Australia, and is shipped to China for production.

attributes.name: Wool - raw material
attributes.title: Wool - raw material
attributes.description:
Wool Raw material (comes from):
25% Australian 
18% China
11% New Zeland
3% Argentina

attributes.name: Manufactuing
attributes.title: Manufactuing
attributes.description:
Manufacturing includes many steps: 
Fiber selection
Topmaking
Spinning
Knitting
Weaving
